import {React ,useState , useEffect } from 'react' import './profile.css' import axios from 'axios' import Topbar from '../../components/Topbar' import Sidebar from '../../components/sidebar/Sidebar' import Rightbar from '../../components/rightbar/Rightbar' import Feeds from '../../components/feeds/Feeds' export default function Profile() { const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const [user, setUser] = useState({}) // getting user useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get( `/users?username=newest`); setUser(res.data) console.log(user) } fetchUser(); },[]) return ( <>

{user.username}

{user.desc}
) }
